term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - mass-average velocity in electrolytes
term.title: mass-average velocity

item.text: Mass-average velocity: v b = ρ-1 ∑ C i M i v i where M i = molar mass, ct = total concentration (mol m-1),ρ = density of the solution (kg m-3).

item.alttext: v b = ρ-1 ∑ C i M i v i
v m = c t-1 ∑ c i v i

sources.item: PAC, 1981, 53, 1827. 'Nomenclature for transport phenomena in electrolytic systems' on page 1831 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198153101827)
